title: K-UD: Revising Korean Universal Dependencies Guidelines
authors:
Kyuwon Kim, Yige Chen, Eunkyul Leah Jo, KyungTae Lim, Jungyeul Park,
  Chulwoo Park
abstract:
Critique has surfaced concerning the existing linguistic annotation framework
for Korean Universal Dependencies (UDs), particularly in relation to syntactic
relationships. In this paper, our primary objective is to refine the definition
of syntactic dependency of UDs within the context of analyzing the Korean
language. Our aim is not only to achieve a consensus within UDs but also to
garner agreement beyond the UD framework for analyzing Korean sentences using
dependency structure, by establishing a linguistic consensus model.
